snippet.title: I Try: Mortal Kombat Advance (GBA)
snippet.description:
I'm not really not into these kind of fighting games where you got to learn long combos etc, and so I'm not really good at them either. Still, this is a rather poor example of such a game I think.

I don't get very far, the controls suck. The combat is chunky and clumsy. I find a cheap attack to make it to some kind of boss, which I just didn't think I would beat without learning some other cheap trick that actually worked on this boss. No thanks.
